references.paper_title: 3D Gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the core 3D Gaussian splatting technique which is the foundation of the proposed GSTAR method.

references.paper_title: KinectFusion: Real-time dense surface mapping and tracking
references.reason: This paper presents a fundamental approach to real-time 3D surface reconstruction, which is relevant to the GSTAR method's goal of accurate surface reconstruction in dynamic scenes.

references.paper_title: HumanRF: High-fidelity neural radiance fields for humans in motion
references.reason: This paper is a key comparative method representing the state-of-the-art in dynamic scene representation using neural radiance fields, providing a benchmark for GSTAR's performance.

references.paper_title: Mip-NeRF 360: Unbounded anti-aliased neural radiance fields
references.reason: This paper provides a highly relevant improvement to NeRF technology, which is related to the challenges addressed in the GSTAR method, specifically regarding handling complex scenes and anti-aliasing.

references.paper_title: Marching cubes: A high resolution 3d surface construction algorithm
references.reason: This foundational paper describes the Marching Cubes algorithm, used in surface reconstruction from volumetric data, a technique relevant to several methods compared against in this paper.
